channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Top crypto funding stories of 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: 2022 was a record-breaking year for blockchain and crypto VCs. Depending on who you ask, that's either a good thing or a bad thing.

item.title: SBF to enter plea deal, Mango’s exploiter arrested, and Celsius news: Hodler’s Digest, Dec. 25-31
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff

item.title: 2023 will see the death of play-to-earn gaming
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shinnosuke 'Shin' Murata
item.description: Developers have been focusing more on tokens than on making fun games. As a result, GameFi has been dying.

item.title: US lawmakers under pressure following FTX collapse: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: In response to FTX's fall, United States lawmakers are reevaluating the crypto industry's regulatory needs for 2023.

item.title: Bitcoin stays put with yearly close set to seal 60% YTD BTC price loss
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Little fresh BTC price action greets traders in the final hours of 2022, with Bitcoin avoiding any form of last-minute trend change.

item.title: Winners and losers of 2022: A disastrous year that saw few winners among a sea of losers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: 2022 was an eventful year for the crypto world but not everyone came on top of it, we look at some of the biggest winners and losers from 2022.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried to reportedly plead not guilty to criminal charges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Following a court hearing on Dec. 22, SBF was released on bail and is slated to appear on court on Jan.3 before U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan in Manhattan.

item.title: 'Crypto winter' won't end in 2023 — Bitcoin advocate David Marcus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: It will be "another tough year" for crypto in the wake of the FTX scandal, suggests the former Meta executive turned Bitcoin Lightning Network advocate.

item.title: Proof of reserves is becoming more effective, but not all its challenges are technical
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: PoR is benefitting from intense development efforts, but in the final analysis good conduct requires good regulation and a culture of compliance.

item.title: New research indicates boomers make better crypto investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nathan Thompson
item.description: Boomers do significantly more research before investing in cryptocurrency than their younger counterparts, which puts them in a stronger position.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried denies moving funds from Alameda wallets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The former FTX CEO denied moving the funds saying; "I'm not and couldn't be moving any of those funds; I don't have access to them anymore.”

item.title: Bithumb’s largest shareholder executive found dead following allegations of embezzlement
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Mr. Park Mo was found dead after an investigation had been launched against him for embezzlement and stock price manipulation.

item.title: Ethereum founder says he hopes Solana gets a 'chance to thrive'
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Vitalik Buterin says that “smart people” have told him Solana has an “earnest” developer community.

item.title: DeFi sees exploits and exit scam drama in the last week of 2022: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The last week of 2022 didn't turn out to be a good one as the industry recorded multiple exploits and an exit scam scare.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Did Michael Saylor buy the Bitcoin bottom for once?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: MicroStrategy scooped up BTC at an average price of just under $17,200. Meanwhile, Binance's CZ explains why there's so much FUD surrounding his exchange.

item.title: Companies and investors may need to return billions in funds paid by FTX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Billions of dollars paid in the months leading up to FTX’s bankruptcy may be returned to pay the crypto exchange’s creditors, according to an insolvency attorney.

item.title: 10 crypto tweets that aged like milk: 2022 edition
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, Do Kwon and Alex Mashinsky might look back on this year and wish they had hired a social media adviser or logged off Twitter.

item.title: Price analysis 12/30: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT, LTC, UNI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins remain under pressure as bounces off support levels are being sold into.

item.title: BTC price lurches toward $16K as stocks, dollar wobble in final session
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: The final tradfi trading day of 2022 offers little inspiration to bulls with Bitcoin price action trending down in line with both equities and the U.S. dollar.

item.title: Crypto Stories: How Bitcoin helped a couple start a family
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: These Bitcoiners from London have "no regrets" about their decision to sell Bitcoin to start a family.

item.title: 3 reasons why Bitcoin is likely heading below $16,000
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Reasons for bearishness include U.S. Federal Reserve tightening, the absence of leverage buyers’ demand, and fearful BTC options traders.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘not undervalued yet,’ says research as BTC price drifts nearer to $16K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: An indicator tracking transactions in profit and loss has yet to repeat its traditional bear market bottom sequence, says CryptoQuant.

item.title: What is USD Coin (USDC), fiat-backed stablecoin explained
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: USDC is a U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin issued by Circle and Coinbase to combat the price swings of the highly volatile cryptocurrency market.

item.title: Mati Greenspan’s boss bribed him with 1 BTC to join Twitter: Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons

item.title: Crypto Unicorns founder: P2E gaming is in a long ‘maturation phase’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alyssa Exposito
item.description: Crypto Unicorns founder Aron Beierschmitt chats with NFT Steez about the key components blockchain-games need to build sustainable in-game play-and-earn economies.

item.title: $8K dive or $22K rebound? Bitcoin traders anticipate Q1 BTC price action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Anything could happen in the coming weeks and months when Bitcoin attempts to break out of its post-FTX trading range.

item.title: Here’s what SBF’s fake electronics outlet ‘North Dimension’ looks like
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: A shop with obscure brand partners and generic texts, where you can't really buy anything.

item.title: Investors seek to sell FTX, Celsius, BlockFi, Voyager claims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Hedge funds and debt investors have already purchased some of the claims.

item.title: Ethereum needs to defend $1,180 to sustain this 50-day ascending pattern
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: ETH price bulls struggle as futures remain trading below its fair value, signaling excessive demand for shorts.

item.title: FTX founder reportedly cashes out $684K after being released on bail
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: SBF has allegedly cashed out $684,000 from a crypto exchange in Seychelles while being under house arrest, according to an on-chain investigation.
